definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Ponson, distinguished for seascapes, took part in salons since 1861.
sentences.chinese: 彭松以描繪海景著稱，1861年起在巴黎沙龍參展。

sentences.english: Unique seascape toilet attaching to the main bedroom elucidates individual life space.
sentences.chinese: 獨有全海景主臥洗手間，張揚個性生活空間。

sentences.english: Overlooking by the window, enjoy270O seascape as much as you like.
sentences.chinese: 憑窗遠眺，270O無敵海景盡情收納。

sentences.english: Would you like an ocean or a garden view?
sentences.chinese: 你想要有海景的還是有花園景色的？

sentences.english: Painting seascapes always requires a water base layer.
sentences.chinese: 畫海景總是需要水基層。

sentences.english: We stayed in room 959 which enjoys a wonderful view of the water.
sentences.chinese: 我們住的是959號房，能看到美麗的海景。
東南海景，環境清幽，會所設施。

sentences.english: We stayed in L'Hotel Island South for five nights.
sentences.chinese: 我們在南灣海景酒店住了五晚。

sentences.english: The guy charged extra for sea view room.
sentences.chinese: 那個傢伙爲海景房收了額外的費用。

sentences.english: A double room with the sea view.
Shading the water in a seascape painting will add depth and dimension.
sentences.chinese: 底紋在海景畫的水會增加深度和維度。

sentences.english: Say a decent bar, Male is a great place to taste sea town.
sentences.chinese: 說點正經的吧，馬累是品味小城海景的絕佳去處。

sentences.english: With a cozy and unique lake side environment, the Pousada Marina Infante is an international standard four-star hotel.
sentences.chinese: 皇庭海景酒店爲一所國際標準評定的四星級酒店。

sentences.english: If a room has a seaside view, for example, display the view.
sentences.chinese: 如果是海景房，舉例來說，則把海景也展示出來。

sentences.english: If a room has a seaside view, for example, display the view.
sentences.chinese: 如果是海景房，舉例來說，則把海景也展示出來。

definition: Yalong Bay in Sanya 三亞|三亚[San1 ya4], Hainan
Victoria Harbor, Hong Kong/abbr. for 維多利亞港|维多利亚港[Wei2 duo1 li4 ya4 Gang3]
balcony/patio/flat roof/terrace/deck (unroofed platform)/outdoor stage/ancient imperial celestial observation terrace
water and sky merge in one color (idiom)
